overview: In Vaulx-en-Velin, in the suburbs of Lyon, five actors, obliged to stay with local people while they put on a play about George Sand in a recently disused factory, find themselves confronted with the world of work and measure, through the encounters they have to make on a daily basis, how much, as a result of cultural shifts, these two worlds have drifted apart.
title: Canevas la ville
